title: Gifting a PROJECT Skin question
body: Back in the day when Lucian was still running the BT to Tri build, I would duo with a buddy of mine. He would be Leona while I be Lucian. We didn't get very far (Silver 2), but I had a lot of great moments with him. So I'm planning to buy project Lucian for myself and get that border, while gifting him project Leona to commemorate our time , but if I gift Project Leona to my friend, will he get the border as well.

replies.body: If you gift a skin during the First Strike promotion (through the 15th), the person receiving the gift will receive the border. :]
i just gifted myself the skin and got the border, seems safe to do. if anything does happen you can always contact support theyll help!
Thanks you two. Appreciate the help!
Or just to be safe, gift him rp so he can get the leona skin.
